Mutt config [~/.muttrc]
---------------------

# Mutt Config

# About
set from = "travis@fastmail.org"
set realname = "Travis Witt"
set signature = "~/.mutt/.signature"

# Credentials
set ssl_starttls = yes
set ssl_force_tls = yes
set smtp_url = "smtp://travis@fastmail.org@smtp.fastmail.com:587"
set smtp_pass = "PASSWORD"
set imap_user = "travis@fastmail.org"
set imap_pass = "PASSWORD"

# Sendmail
set sendmail = "/usr/bin/msmtp"


# Mailboxes
set folder = "imaps://imap.fastmail.com"
set spoolfile = "+INBOX"
set record = +Sent


# Where to put the stuff
set header_cache = "~/.mutt/cache/headers"
set message_cachedir = "~/.mutt/cache/bodies"
set certificate_file = "~/.mutt/certificates"

# Etc
set mail_check = 30
set move = no
set imap_keepalive = 900
set sort = threads
set editor = "vim"

# GnuPG bootstrap
# source ~/.mutt/gpg.rc
